trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute"></xref> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute> routed events.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute"> </xref> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute>os eventos encaminhados.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute>

trans-unit.source: Typically, a command source, such a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>, will call the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> method on a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> to determine if the command can or cannot execute on the current command target.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, uma origem de comando tais um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>, irá chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>método num <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>para determinar se o comando pode ou não é possível executar o destino de comando atual.</xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs.CanExecute%2A> is set to `false` from an event handler, the command source will disable itself.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs.CanExecute%2A>está definido como `false` de um processador de eventos, a origem de comando irá desativar a próprio.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs.CanExecute%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> is acting as the command source for a command and the command cannot execute on the current command target, then the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> will gray itself out.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>está a agir como a origem de comando para um comando e o comando não é possível executar no destino atual do comando, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>será gray próprio out.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged> event notifies a command source when the ability of a command to execute may have changed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged>eventos notifica uma origem de comando quando a capacidade de um comando a executar pode ter sido alterado.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref> associated with this event can be executed on the command target.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"> </xref> associada a este evento pode ser executado no destino do comando.

trans-unit.source: Many command sources, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, are disabled when CanExecute is `false` and enabled when the CanExecute is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Muitas comando origens, tal como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, estão desativadas quando CanExecute ser `false` e ativado quando o CanExecute ser `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event can be executed on the command target; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o evento pode ser executado no destino comando; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the command associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o comando associado este evento.

trans-unit.source: For more information on commanding, see the [Commanding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre commanding, consulte o [descrição geral do Commanding](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The command.
trans-unit.target: O comando.

trans-unit.source: Unless the command is a custom command, this is generally a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A menos que o comando comandos personalizados, isto é, geralmente, um <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: There is no default value.
trans-unit.target: Não há nenhum valor predefinido.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the input routed event that invoked the command should continue to route through the element tree.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o evento encaminhado de entrada que invocar o comando deve continuar encaminhar através de árvore do elemento.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the routed event should continue to route through element tree; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o evento encaminhado deve continuar a encaminhar através de árvore do elemento; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the command specific data.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os dados específicos de comando.

trans-unit.source: The command parameter is used to pass specific information to the command when it is executed.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro de comando é utilizado para transmitir informações específicas para o comando quando é executada.

trans-unit.source: The type of the data is defined by the command.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de dados é definido pelo comando.

trans-unit.source: Parameter can be `null`.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro pode ser `null`.

trans-unit.source: Many commands do not process or expect command parameters.
trans-unit.target: Vários comandos não processam ou esperar parâmetros de comando.

trans-unit.source: The command data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de comandos.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
